Title: MVC Table Styling selection to CSS and demo table
Description: Enter table styling by selection from drop-down list and both generated CSS and see effect of the CSS on a demo table.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Enter table styling by selection from drop-down list and both generated CSS and see effect of the CSS on a demo table.

This project follows an idea from a PHP page, whereby table characteristics can be selected from drop-down lists and as the selection takes place, a sample table displays the effect of the selection.

The project has been deployed at http://www.tatworth.net.
